summary.title: Smart Grid Threat Model
summary.description: The system is a combination of a communication, power and co simulator to simulate the power grid over middle and lower voltage.

diagrams.title: Initial Threat Analysis

data.name: SMGW
data.description: Erfasst Zaehlerdaten, verpackt sie als InfoReports und steuert ueber ControlMessages Hausanschlussgeraete

data.name: VNB-SCADA
data.description: Das Supervisory Control and Data Aquisition (SCADA) ist ein Leitsystem des Verteilnetzbetreibers fuer Smart-Meter-Daten und CLS-Steuerung (Load-/Generation-Commands). Es ist fuer hihg-level Ueberwachung und Kontrolle von Geraeten, Prozessen und Distributed Control Systems.

data.name: Command Frame
data.description: Control Frame, diese bestehen aus Start/Stop Transmissions, Fragen ueber Konfigurationen oder Header Informationen, Control Commands an bestimmt PMUs und die Anfrage von historischen PMU Daten.

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

data.name: Data Frame
data.description: Synchrophasor Data Frame, der daraus besteht dass dort Phasorgroessen (U/I, Frequenz, ROCOF) enthalten sind. Dazu kommen noch Antworten auf Anfragen vom WAMS-Backend.
data.protocol: IEC 61850-GOOSE TLS-getunnelt, IEC 61850 over IEC 62351-3 TLS

threats.title: False Data Injection
threats.description: Manipulating sensor readings from PMUs and Protected-IEDs to cause incorrect state estimation
threats.mitigation:
- End-to-end encryption and digital signatures on all data flows
- Anomaly detection and cross-validation with redundant data sources

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

data.name: Aggregierte InfoReports
data.description: Das SCADA System sendet eine aggregierte Sammlung an InfoReports von den SMGWs an das DSO-DMS, um die wichtigen Telemetriedaten weiterzureichen. Dabei ist eine real-time Ueberwachung nicht vorgegeben, weshalb es in Batches versendet wird.

threats.title: SCADA Operational data
threats.description: Altering operational data flowing to DSO-DMS systems
threats.mitigation:
- Network segmentation between IT and OT
- Strict firewall rules
- Secure protocol gateways

threats.title: Eavesdropping
threats.description: Passive monitoring of sensitive operational data and control commands
threats.mitigation:
- Use strong encryption (TLS/IPsec) for all data in transit
- Regular key rotation and management

threats.title: Credential Compromise
threats.description: Stolen authentication credentials being used to traverse trust boundaries
threats.mitigation:
- Multi-factor authentication
- RBAC with least privilege
- Audit trails and behavioral monitoring

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

data.name: Aggregierte Phasorreports
data.description: IEC 61850 MMS Report

threats.title: Letarel Movement
threats.description: Attackers moving laterally across network boundaries
threats.mitigation:
- Zero-trust network architecture
- Micro-segmentation and least-privilege access

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: Provide a description for this threat
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.mitigation:

- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

data.name: GOOSE Confirmation
data.description: Die GOOSE Confirmation Message ist genau das was es sagt und gibt dem DSO-DMS eine Meldung, dass die Aktion ausgefuehrt wurde und somit die zugehoerigen Breaker oder Field Devices aktiv sind.

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

threats.title: Backdoored Firmware in Protection-IEDs
threats.description: Backdoored firmware in field devices (e.g., smart meters or protection relays) enables persistent access.
threats.mitigation:
- Vendor Risk Assesment
- Code Signing & Verification
- Secure Boot
- Ongoing Code Scanning
- Zero Trust Supply Chain Model
- Track and Trace

data.name: GOOSE-Trip
data.description: Der GOOSE-Trip ist ein signal an das Protected-IED, dass es auf ein Fehler reagieren soll und somit ein Circuit Breaker oder ein andere Field Device aktiviert werden muss. Dies muss in sehr kurzer Zeit passieren (unter 4ms).

data.name: SCADA-Data
data.description: Strom, Spannung, Alarm, Status als MMS Report, also alle Telemetriedaten die vom SCADA System kommen. Dazu kommen noch Logs und historische Daten vom SCADA System die der Operator gebrauchen kann.

data.name: CLS-Setpoint
data.description: Der CLS-Setpoint besteht aus TargetPower, TargetVoltage, TargetFrequency festlegen, LoadReduction/Increase commands und Time Validierung, bzw. Scheduling.

threats.title: Ransomeware
threats.description: Encrypting critical operational data and systems
threats.mitigation:
- Redundancy
- Communication Monitoring

threats.title: Load Manipulation
threats.description: Coordinated attacks across multiple boundaries to cause grid instability
threats.mitigation: - Prevent simpler attacks from happening to prevent coordinated attacks. If you break the small the combination cannot appear.

threats.title: Microgrid Compromise
threats.description: Manipulation of local energy management and control systems
threats.mitigation:
- Secure boot, hardware security modules, and firmware integrity checks
- Regular vulnerability scanning and patch management
- Physical security controls

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

data.name: Control
data.description: Operate and Target Power als CLS-JSON

threats.title: DER-Gateway Exploitation
threats.description: Distributed Energy Resource control manipulation to destabilize grid operations
threats.mitigation:
- Secure boot, hardware security modules, and firmware integrity checks
- Regular vulnerability scanning and patch management
- Physical security controls

threats.title: Replay Attack
threats.description: Replaying legitimate control commands at inappropriate times
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Use nonces/timestamps to prevent replay
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Command Injection
threats.description: Inserting malicious control commands into legitimate communication streams
threats.mitigation:
- Strong authentication (MFA, certificates)
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Input validation and whitelisting

threats.title: DDoS
threats.description: Coordinated attacks against multiple communication nodes simultaneously
threats.mitigation:
- Rate limiting and traffic filtering
- Redundant network paths and failover
- DDoS mitigation appliances/services

threats.title: Fingerprinting
threats.description:
See OWASP Automated Threat #4:
Specific requests are sent to the application eliciting information in order to profile the application
threats.mitigation: Defence includes restricting what information is provided, for example version numbers and package details

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

threats.title: Unauthorized Voltage Setpoint Change
threats.description: Adversaries manipulate voltage setpoints in real-time via compromised micro-controllers, causing equipment damage or cascading outages.
threats.mitigation:
- Role-based access control
- Strong Authentication (MFA)
- Command Validation
- Anomaly detection
- End-to-End encryption (TLS 1.3)

data.name: Meter Values
data.description: P/Q, SOC als CLS-JSON

threats.description: Electric vehicle charging infrastructure manipulation affecting grid load balancing
threats.mitigation:
- Secure boot, hardware security modules, and firmware integrity checks
- Regular vulnerability scanning and patch management
- Physical security controls

threats.mitigation:
- End-to-end encryption and digital signatures on all data flows
- Anomaly detection and cross-validation with redundant data sources

threats.title: Unauthorized Voltage Setpoint Change
threats.description: Adversaries manipulate voltage setpoints in real-time via compromised micro-controllers, causing equipment damage or cascading outages.
threats.mitigation:
- Role-based access control
- Strong Authentication (MFA)
- Command Validation
- Anomaly detection
- End-to-End encryption (TLS 1.3)

data.name: Pricing
data.description: Communication of the current power prices. This is done by a given interval depending on the current model.

threats.title: Pricing Signal Manipulation
threats.description: Adversaries falsify dynamic pricing signals sent to DERs or consumers, triggering abrupt load changes that destabilize the grid or manipulate energy markets.
threats.mitigation:
- Digitally sign all pricing/load signals (e.g., using IEC 62351 or OpenADR 3.0).
- Validate signals against redundant sources (e.g., independent market feeds).
- Deploy anomaly detection for abnormal price/load patterns.

threats.title: Rogue Device Injection
threats.description: Entering a third party device that porpusfully inserts false data or ignores control commands.
threats.mitigation:
- Device authentication 
- network segmentation
- privacy-preserving data aggregation

threats.title: IoT Botnet Participation
threats.description: An IoT device is compromised and part of a botnet, which leads to ignored control commands, false data injection and/or control sequence injection.
threats.mitigation:
- Device authentication 
- network segmentation
- privacy-preserving data aggregation

threats.title: Privacy Leakage via Smart Meter Data
threats.description: A third party or otherwise compromised IoT device can leak information about the grid or customer information, leading to a privacy degredation.
threats.mitigation:
- Device authentication 
- network segmentation
- privacy-preserving data aggregation

data.name: Meter Data/Status
data.protocol: DLMS/COSEM over TLS 1.3, IEC 60870-5-104 with IEC 62351, HTTPS/TLS 1.3 (REST/JSON)

threats.title: API Abuse
threats.description: Using weak API authentication to enter the smart grid.
threats.mitigation:
- API security gateways
- strong authentication
- input validation
- monitoring.

data.name: Meter Data/Status
data.protocol: DLMS/COSEM over TLS 1.3, IEC 60870-5-104 with IEC 62351, HTTPS/TLS 1.3 (REST/JSON)

threats.title: API Abuse
threats.description: Using weak API authentication to enter the smart grid.
threats.mitigation:
- API security gateways
- strong authentication
- input validation
- monitoring.

threats.title: Data Poisoning via Head-End
threats.description: This includes False Data Injection, command injection and other tampering attacks.
threats.mitigation:
- API security gateways
- strong authentication
- input validation
- monitoring.

data.name: Firmware/Software Update
data.description: This is an example connection for the remote firmware/update process. This connection needs to go to all devices that are being updated remotely, such as microgrid controllers, customer DER/IoT, PMUs and so on.

threats.title: Insider Privilege Abuse
threats.description: An insider of the update management can push an update in order to insert either a backdoor or grand privileges to unauthorized people.
threats.mitigation:
- least privilege
- behavioral monitoring
- strict contractor vetting
- secure remote access.

data.name: Renewable generation/load forecasts
data.description: Dies sagt dem DSO-DMS wie viel Strom durch erneuerbare Energie erwartet wird.

data.name: Aggregated meter readings
data.description: As the title suggests these are the aggregated meter readings, which are used for invoice calculation.

data.name: OCSP Respons
data.description: Antwort auf den Request, nach passender Analyse, Generierung oder als Bestaetigung eines Wiederrufs.

threats.title: OCSP Responder Compromise
threats.description: Attackers can manipulate certificate validation responses, to allow them to revoke certificates to appear valid
threats.mitigation:
- Use of strong mutual TLS authentication for all PKI communications
- Harden and isolate PKI servers
- Regularly auditing and monitoring of certificate status and PKI integrity

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols

data.description: Fragt das SMGW ueber Geraete Status an, um Outages zu bemerken, die nicht gewollt werden.

data.name: Control Message
data.description: Das SCADA System sendet TargetPower oder LoadReduction commands zum SMGW, um die Steuerung der Field Devices zu ermoeglichen.

threats.title: Communication Protocol Downgrade
threats.description: Forcing systems to use weaker communication protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Use nonces/timestamps to prevent replay
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Timestamp Tampering
threats.description: Affecting coordination between protection systems and control centers
threats.mitigation:
- Use authenticated time sources
- Redundant time synchronization mechanisms
- Monitor for anomalies in time data

threats.title: DoS
threats.description: Flooding critical communication channels, especially affecting real-time control systems
threats.mitigation:
- Rate limiting and traffic filtering
- Redundant network paths and failover
- DDoS mitigation appliances/services

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting and modifying communications between control centers and field devices
threats.mitigation:
- Mutual authentication (certificates)
- Regular protocol and certificate audits

threats.title: Traffic Analysis
threats.description: Inferring operational patterns and vulnerabilities through network traffic observation
threats.mitigation:
- Use strong encryption (TLS/IPsec) for all data in transit
- Regular key rotation and management

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

data.description: Das SMGW oder eine andere Einheit des Systems benoetigt ein Zertifikat oder checkt ob ein gegebenes Zertifikat bereits wiederrufen wurde.

data.name: IDS-Syslog Alarm
data.description: Dieser Dataflow beschreibt die Benachrichtigung des SIEM durch das IDS, welches das Smart Grid ueberwacht. Es gibt also ein Alarm aus welcher dann Analysiert wird.

threats.title: Blind Security Monitoring
threats.description: Attackers may attempt to blind security monitoring systems to avoid detection during attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Secure log storage (write-once, cryptographically signed)
- Deploy redundant monitoring
- Use anomaly detection and regular log audits

threats.title: Falsifying Log
threats.description: Falsifying security event logs to cover attack traces
threats.mitigation:
- Secure log storage (write-once, cryptographically signed)
- Deploy redundant monitoring
- Use anomaly detection and regular log audits

threats.title: Protection System Bypass
threats.description: Disabling or manipulating protective relays and monitoring systems
threats.mitigation:
- Strong authentication (MFA, certificates)
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Input validation and whitelisting

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

data.description: Metering Reading Daten werden in Batches, um die Kommunikation zu reduzieren, an den Operational Data Store gesendet.

threats.mitigation:

threats.mitigation:

- Anomaly detection and cross-validation with redundant data sources

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting certificate validation traffic to enable impersonation attacks
threats.mitigation:
- Enforce certificate pinning and strict TLS validation
- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

data.name: CRL push/download
data.description: Der OCSP Responder gibt eine Pushnachricht an den CRL-Server, wenn ein Zertifikat wiederrufen wurde und kann gleichzeitig nachfragen und somit auf Anfragen antworten, ob ein gegebenes Zertifikat bereits wiederrufen wurde. Es ist auch moeglich, dass der OCSP-Responder eine aktuelle Version der CRL cached und updated, wenn notwendig.

threats.title: DoS
threats.description: Es werden zu viele Anfragen von einem externen Geraet an den CRL Server gesendet und somit die Verbindung zwischen OCSP Responder und CRL Server gestoert, sodass die CRL nicht abgerufen werden kann und ein Zertifikatswiederrufungscheck nicht moeglich ist.
threats.mitigation:
- Kommunikationslimit pro Geraet
- Redumdance von OCSP Responder und CRL Server

data.name: SIEM Response
data.description: Die Antwort auf den vom IDS gesendeten Alarm. Dieser kann system/device commands enthalten oder Aktionen die von einem Operator ausgefuehrt werden muessen.

threats.title: Exploiting Vulnerable Protocols
threats.description: Exploiting vulnerabilities in DNP3, IEC 61850, and other industrial protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

data.name: Control Message
data.description: Die Control Messages beinhalten Commands wie setpoints, load reduction und DER dispatch.

threats.title: Communication Protocol Downgrade
threats.description: Forcing systems to use weaker communication protocols
threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)
- Use nonces/timestamps to prevent replay
- Disable legacy/weak protocol support

threats.title: Timestamp Tampering
threats.description: Affecting coordination between protection systems and control centers
threats.mitigation:
- Use authenticated time sources
- Redundant time synchronization mechanisms
- Monitor for anomalies in time data

threats.title: DoS
threats.description: Flooding critical communication channels, especially affecting real-time control systems
threats.mitigation:
- Rate limiting and traffic filtering
- Redundant network paths and failover
- DDoS mitigation appliances/services

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle
threats.description: Intercepting and modifying communications between control centers and field devices
threats.mitigation:
- Mutual authentication (certificates)
- Regular protocol and certificate audits

threats.title: Traffic Analysis
threats.description: Inferring operational patterns and vulnerabilities through network traffic observation
threats.mitigation:
- Use strong encryption (TLS/IPsec) for all data in transit
- Regular key rotation and management

threats.title: Exploit Vulnerable Protocols

- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)

data.name: Outage Alarm
data.description: Das Outage Management System sendet ein Alarm an das SCADA System, wenn ein groesserer Ausfall bemerkt wird, damit passende Schritte eingeleitet werden koennen.

threats.title: Vulnerable transport protocol
threats.description: Older transport protocols are vulnerable and have known vulnerabilities
threats.mitigation: Use up to date cryptography and transport protocols

threats.title: Alarm Reduction
threats.description: Der Angreifer faengt den Alarm ab und aendert oder loescht ihn, sodass das SCADA System die falschen Aktionen in die Wege leitet.
threats.mitigation:
- Senden eines Acknowledgements
- Verschluesselte und signierte Kommunikation

threats.description: Flooding critical communication channels, especially affecting real-time control systems
threats.mitigation:
- Rate limiting and traffic filtering
- Redundant network paths and failover
- DDoS mitigation appliances/services

data.name: Outage/Restore Reports
data.description: Im Falle von Ausfaellen oder Widerherstellungen wird ein Report in dem Operational Data Storage gespeichert.

threats.title: False Data Injection
threats.description: Manipulating sensor readings from PMUs and Protected-IEDs to cause incorrect state estimation
threats.mitigation:
- End-to-end encryption and digital signatures on all data flows
- Anomaly detection and cross-validation with redundant data sources

- Use HSTS and OCSP stapling

data.name: DSO-DMS-Data
data.description: Dies beinhaltet Logs, Wetterdaten, Alerts und Planungsdaten die vom DMS versendet oder aufgenommen werden.

threats.title: False Data Injection
threats.description: Corrupting logs, weather data, alerts and planning data affects the grid monitoring and control decisions of the Grid Operator.
threats.mitigation:
- Network segmentation between IT and OT
- Strict firewall rules
- Secure protocol gateways

data.description: Die Control Commands werden verwendet um manuelles oder remote switching zu ermoeglichen und Konfigurationen zu aendern.

data.name: Status Report
data.description: Periodisches senden von Statusmeldungen und Messwerten der zugehoerigen Geraete. Dazu gehoeren auch Eventlogs.

threats.mitigation:
- Only allow secure, up-to-date protocols (e.g., TLS 1.3)

data.name:
Outage 
Management 
System
data.description: System fuer Ausfallermittlung: Polling von Smart Meter Gateways (ANSI C12.22/DLMS) und Auswerten von Responses.

threats.title: Compromised Operational Data Store
threats.description: An attacker compromises the Data Store and tampers with the logged data leading to wrong conclusions from historical data and incorrect billing calculation.
threats.mitigation:
- Use of strong mutual TLS authentication for all PKI communications
- Harden and isolate PKI servers
- Regularly auditing and monitoring of certificate status and PKI integrity

data.name: IDS/SIEM
data.description:
Das Intrusion Detection System (IDS) beobachtet ein Netzwerk oder System und gibt ein Alarm aus, wenn es verdaechtige Aktivitaeten bemerkt oder gegen vorgegebene Regeln verstossen wird. 
Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) wiederum sammelt log Data fuer Analysen und alamiert darauf basieren die zustaendigen Einheiten. Dazu kommt noch real-time system monitoring, welches den Systemadmin ueber relevante Probleme informiert und Eventkorrelationen erstellt.
Die beiden Systeme arbeiten meist zusammen, wobei das IDS fuer das eigentlich Monitoring und detektieren von gefaehrlichen Aktivitaeten zustaendig ist und das SIEM daraufhin alamiert wird und passende Aktionen in die Wege leitet.
Empfaengt IDS-Alarme via Syslog, korreliert Security-Events und priorisiert Vorfaelle fuer das Security Operation Center.

data.name: CRL-Server
data.description:
Stellt Certificate Revocation List (CRLs) bereit, damit Clients die Zertifikatsgueltigkeit pruefen koennen.
Am ende ist es eine Art Datastorage in dem ein Liste an allen gespeicherten Zertifikaten liegt, die vom OCSP-Responder wiederrufen wurden.
Die CRL Dateien wiederum sind signiert vom Certificate Authority via RSA mit SHA 256/512.

threats.title: CRL-Server Compromise
threats.description: Certificate Revocation List tampering can enable the use of compromised certificates
threats.mitigation:
- Use of strong mutual TLS authentication for all PKI communications
- Harden and isolate PKI servers
- Regularly auditing and monitoring of certificate status and PKI integrity

data.name: OCSP-Responder
data.description:
Online Certificate Status Protocol (OCSP): gibt in Echtzeit den Wiederrufstatus von X.509-Zertifikaten aus.
Im Allgemeinen ist es ein certificate manager der fuer die Erstellung, Speicherung und Wiederrufung digitaler Sicherheitszertifikate notwendig ist.

data.name: PMU
data.description: Messen von Phasorgroessen (U/I, Frequenz, ROCOF) mit PTP-Zeitstempel und Streaming an WAMS

threats.title: GPS Spoofing
threats.description: Disrupting phasor measurement timing, causing false fault detection and potential line disconnections
threats.mitigation:
- Use authenticated time sources
- Redundant time synchronization mechanisms
- Monitor for anomalies in time data

data.name: WAMS-Backend
data.description: Das Wide Area Monitoring System (WAMS) sammelt Phasordaten und fungiert als Analyseplattform fuer Wide-Area Monitoring & Protection (WAMPAC, State Estimation). Dabei werden die Daten visualisiert und fuer einen Operator aufbereitet.
data.privilegeLevel: Access to Sensitive Data, Critical Security Role, Full Operational Control

data.name: DSO-DMS
data.description:
Distributed System Operator: Real-Time Grid Operation und Monitoring. Er nutzt das Distribution Management System, um damit Controll Commands anhand der InfoReports und weiteren eingehenden Informationen auszugeben, um die Systemrequirements sicher zu stellen.
Distribution Management System: Netzueberwachung, Lastfluss- und Spannungsregelung, FLISR-Funktionen
data.privilegeLevel: Full Operational Control, Access to Sensitive Data, Critical Security Role

data.name: Protected-IED
data.description: Das Protected-IED (Intelligent Electronic Device) Schutzrelais fuer Distanzschutz, Differentialschutz. Wenn ein Fehler bemerkt wird, dann wird ein trip command an die Breaker via GOOSE ausgeloest, um die fehlerhafte Netzzonen zu isolieren. Somit beinhaltet das Protected-IED auch monitoring Funktionen.
data.privilegeLevel: Full Operational Control, Access to Sensitive Data, Critical Security Role

data.name: Operator UI
data.description: Dies ist das Grid-Operator-Dashboard, wodurch der Operator mit dem System interagieren kann.

threats.title: Social Engineering
threats.description: Targeting operational personnel with access to critical systems
threats.mitigation:
- Security Trainings
- Quick reaction to security attacks
- Multi-factor authentication
- RBAC with least privilege
- Audit trails and behavioral monitoring

threats.title: Privileged Access Abuse
threats.description: Legitimate users with cross-boundary access conducting malicious activities
threats.mitigation:
- Multi-factor authentication
- RBAC with least privilege
- Audit trails and behavioral monitoring

data.privilegeLevel: Operational Control, Access to Sensitive Data, Critical Security Role

data.name: DER-Gateway
data.description: Schnittstelle zu dezentralen Erzeugungs- bzw. Speicheranlagen fuer Setpoints (P/Q) und Telemetrie (ACK, Status)

data.name: VPP Operator
data.description: Virtuelles Kraftwerks-Management: Registrierung/Deregistrierung, Aggergation von Forecasts und Schedules

threats.title: VPP Operator Compromise
threats.description: Virtual Power Plant systems being used as attack vectors into utility networks
threats.mitigation:
- Network segmentation and strict inter-domain access controls
- Continuous monitoring of inter-domain traffic
- Security vetting of third-party components

data.name:
Microgrid 
Controller
data.description: Bedienoberflaeche und Steuerungsebene fuer grid-connected Microgrids; zeigt MMS-Reports und sendet Dispatch-Befehle

data.name: EVSE-Gateway
data.description: Schnittstelle zu Ladestationen: V2G-Setpoints (ISO 15118), Messwerte (IEC 63110) und Lade-ACKs

threats.title: Third Party Integration
threats.description: Vulnerabilities in external operator connections becoming entry points
threats.mitigation:
- Network segmentation and strict inter-domain access controls
- Continuous monitoring of inter-domain traffic
- Security vetting of third-party components

threats.title: Supply Chain Attack
threats.description: Compromised components introduced through different organizational domains
threats.mitigation:
- Vendor risk assessments
- Secure software/firmware supply chain
- Code signing and verification

data.name:
Customer 
DER/IoT
data.description: e.g., "Balcony PV," "Home Battery," "Smart Appliances"

data.name:
Remote 
Maintenance/Update 
Server
data.description: This actor is responsible for server and device maintenance and firmware and software updates.
data.privilegeLevel: High to enable maintanance and update installation.

data.name:
Forcasting 
System
data.description: Predicts energy generation (e.g., solar/wind) and load patterns.

data.name: Billing System
data.description: Processes metering data for customer billing and settlement.
data.reasonOutOfScope: We do not have the capacity to also look at the billing process and the different evelope techniques that come with it.

diagrams.description: This is used as the initial threat analysis which is high level and will be ported to Threagile for a deeper analysis in the future.
